scripts.vercel-build: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; FLUTTER_VERSION=${FLUTTER_VERSION:-3.37.0}; rm -rf $HOME/flutter; if curl -fL --retry 4 --retry-delay 2 -sSLo /tmp/flutter-sdk.tar.xz https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_${FLUTTER_VERSION}-stable.tar.xz && tar -xf /tmp/flutter-sdk.tar.xz -C $HOME; then echo using tarball; else echo tarball missing, cloning Flutter ${FLUTTER_VERSION}; rm -rf $HOME/flutter; git clone --depth 1 --branch ${FLUTTER_VERSION} https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git $HOME/flutter || git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git $HOME/flutter; fi; git config --global --add safe.directory $HOME/flutter; export PATH="$HOME/flutter/bin:$PATH"; printf "GOOGLE_PLACES_API_KEY=%s\n" "$GOOGLE_PLACES_API_KEY" > .env; flutter config --enable-web; flutter pub get; flutter build web --web-renderer html --release'
